channel.title: How to make the owner never die
channel.description: this has been on my mind for ever is there like a code to make the owner never die and it be like ::135hp and to turn it off it would be ::0hp and another question i need a code for admins thats like ::hide so no one can see you and one ::seen so people can see you please tell me where to put these and what to search for please and thank you ;D

item.title: How to make the owner never die
item.dc:creator: @enzroc enzroc
item.description:
@enzroc wrote:

thank you very much

Read full topic
item.source: How to make the owner never die

item.title: How to make the owner never die
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

I can give you the ::hide and ::show onesâ€¦

if (command.startsWith("hide") && playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("Other players can no longer see you, type ::show to reverse this command."); pHead=-100; pBeard=-100; pTorso=-100; pArms=-100; pHands=-100; pLegs=-100; pFeet=-100; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (command.startsWith("show") && playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("Other players can now see you once again, type ::hide to reverse this command."); pHead=3; pBeard=19; pTorso=19; pArms=29; pHands=35; pLegs=39; pFeet=44; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic
item.source: How to make the owner never die
